title: Border, 1973-51-114, late 18th century
medium:
Medum: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  block-printed: 2 reds, 2 purples, black.  Yellow and blue applied by brush.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 60.5 x 15 cm (23 13/16 x 5 7/8 in.)
Repeat H: 38.1 cm (15 in.)
description: Curving vine with flowers and fruit in bright colors on a deep purple background.
